thread.title: CA, Chester

author: CA, Chester
title: CA, Chester
text:
I used the next day service on a Saturday for replacement of a pothole-damaged front nearside tyre (annoyingly, a virtually new tyre that was only put on 3 weeks ago).
Anyway, the technician arrived a bit before the estimated timeslot, but this was fine by me. The tyre replacement took only about 15 minutes and couldn't have been any more convenient from my point of view.
The technician was friendly and efficient.
The price is competitive with the established tyrefitting players if you need two or more tyres as the fitting is free in this case.
The key benefit though is having the work done at your convenience without having to drive somewhere and wait while the work is done.
